files.patch:
@@ -1573,2 +1573,4 @@ - * {@code mismatch(g,f)}). The only case where there is no file system - * access is when the paths are equal. + * {@code mismatch(g,f)}). + * + *

If both {@code Path} objects are equal, then this method returns + * {@code true} without checking if the file exists.
